menu.title: Fitness Menu
menu.descr: The Fitness Menu is a new approach to meal preparation: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product for active and healthy people. This is an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Fasting Menu
menu.descr: The Fasting Menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, almond, oat, coconut, or buckwheat milk, and the right amount of proteins thanks to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Premium Menu
menu.descr: The Premium Menu features not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality dish execution. Red fish, seafood, and fruits â€“ a restaurant menu without the need to dine out!
